___name.description: Service name for the schema-registry instance(s)

___kafkastore-connection-url.description: Zookeeper Connect string for service cluster. Format is comma-separated list of <zk-host>:<zkport>/<kservice>

___mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each schema-registry instance.

___instances.description: Number of instances to run (currently limited to 1).

___role.description: Deploy schema-registry only on nodes with this role.

___heap.description: JVM heap allocation (in MB) for connect worker task; should be no greater than ~64MB less than total memory for the instance.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each schema-registry instance.
